bannerSubTitle: Simplify your payments processes, reduce your costs and delight your customers.
sectionOneText: Whether you’re sending hundreds or millions of payments,Checkbook’s platform will supercharge your payables experience. Simplify your payments processes, reduce your costs and delight your customers.

horizhoverhmBodyText.TableBody1: Payments are sent through email or text. Recipients choose how they want to accept payments.
horizhoverhmBodyText.TableBody2: From paper to digital, Checkbook provides recipients with all their preferred payment methods.
horizhoverhmBodyText.TableBody3: Checkbook’s all-in-one platform streamlines payments and eliminates complexity.
horizhoverhmBodyText.TableBody4: Integrate and customize Checkbook’s comprehensive functionality into your platform.

sectionThreeText.Heading: Searching for the best enterprise SEO solution?
sectionThreeText.Content: So are you competitors! Schedule a personalized demo today.
